text: Numɨgaiaganu 9.22 Jo 7.13, 16.2, 19.38, HJL 5.13 agɨlaŋ Isɨlaelɨ hɨdɨlɨ agɨladɨ hulaŋ hekɨlɨ hekɨlɨ agɨlasaŋ lɨdavɨmi sadaŋ ciaŋ hameŋ abavɨmi. Isɨlaelɨ hɨdɨlɨ agɨladɨ hulaŋ hekɨlɨ hekɨlɨ agɨlaŋ hɨji pam lamavɨla ciaŋ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ nameŋ abavɨmi. Hulaŋ iamɨgali nameŋ abavɨmɨdɨ uavɨmi. Asɨ agaŋ Jisasɨ dɨ lɨbɨmɨŋavɨla hulaŋ iamɨgali agɨladɨ ahɨliahuiahu saŋ abɨci vemi aba abavɨmɨdɨ uavɨmi. Hameŋ abavɨla nɨbɨlaŋ Asɨ dɨ ibi mɨŋaiahaiaha saŋ aludɨ aŋam ulaŋ ma ivouavɨbali uavɨmi.
